text: National colours are frequently part of a country's set of national symbols. Many states and nations have formally adopted a set of colours as their official "national colours" National colours often appear on a variety of different media, from the nation's flag to the colours used in sports. == Countries == Country Flag Primary colours Secondary colours Primary Secondary Further information Bangladesh Red, green and gold White (football) First Flag of Bangladesh (1971) Republic of India (Bharat) Saffron orange, blue, white and green Sky blue (sports) Iran Green, white and red Black Palestine Black, white, green and red Pakistan Green and white Lime green and gold (sports) National colours of Pakistan United Kingdom Red, white and blue British racing green National colours of the United Kingdom ==Related pages== * List of national symbols == References == Colours
title: National colours
